premise: Neil had been journeying through Asia.
initial: Now he had worked his way south into Australia.

edited_ending: Neil was upset that he would experience the Thai island culture. He had been thrilled at the prospect of exotic animals and people. He was hoping he would be able to feed exotic animals.

premise: My class went to the Everglades for our field trip.
